item.title: Trump admin live updates: Musk to pull back from DOGE with setup work 'mostly done'
item.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk opened his company's earnings call with comments defending the work he was doing with the Department of Government Efficiency.

item.title: WATCH: Video shows grandmother and kids narrowly miss exploding manhole
item.description: Lisa Davis says she was pushing her grandkids in a stroller down the street in Poughkeepsie, New York, when concrete and debris shot into the air.

item.title: Pope Francis live updates: Francis lies in state, thousands wait to pay respects
WATCH: News anchor reacts in terror as she feels earthquake on-air
item.description: A news anchor reacted in terror as her studio shook from a 6.2 magnitude earthquake in Turkey.

item.title: Trump administration asks judge to pause discovery in Abrego Garcia case
item.description: A day after a judge ordered the DOJ to more fully address the wrongful deportation of Kilmar Abrego Garcia, the administration has asked to pause disc...
